title: Boost Your Shipping Velocity With Argo and Buildpacks
author: Sylvain Kalache
description: Learn how to use CNCF incubating project Buildpacks, an application definition, and image build to skip the Dockerfile step and increase developer productivity.
cntitle: 提升您的交付速度：Argo 与 Buildpacks
cndescription: 学习如何使用 CNCF 孵化项目 Buildpacks，一个应用程序定义和镜像构建工具，跳过 Dockerfile 步骤并提高开发人员生产力。
